results.title: [Berberine promotes expression of AQP4 in astrocytes by regulating production of miR-383-5p in HepG2 cell-derived exosomes under insulin resistance].
results.text_hl: The results showed that 10 mumol L~(-1) @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@berberine@@@ and 1 mmol L~(-1) @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly alleviated the @<m>DISEASE_HAIR_AN_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537629 @@@IR@@@ of @CELLLINE_CVCL:0027 @@@HepG2@@@ cells and reduced the concentration of exosomes in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0027 @@@HepG2@@@ cells.

results.title: AMPK Activation Restores Salivary Function Following Radiation Treatment.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, expression of @GENE_SIRT1 @GENE_23411 @@@sirtuin 1@@@ (@GENE_SIRT1 @GENE_23411 @@@SIRT1@@@) and @GENE_NAMPT @GENE_10135 @@@nicotinamide phosphoribosyl transferase@@@ (@GENE_NAMPT @GENE_10135 @@@NAMPT@@@) was lower 5 d following @<m>DISEASE_HAIR_AN_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537629 @@@IR@@@. results.title: Metformin improves ovarian insulin signaling alterations caused by fetal programming.
results.text_hl: Protein expression of IR, @GENE_IRS1 @GENE_25467;29376 @@@IRS1/2@@@ and @GENE_SLC2A4 @GENE_25139 @@@GLUT4@@@ was decreased in both PH groups. In PHiov, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ restored the expression of all the mediators, whereas, in PHanov, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ restored only that of @<m>DISEASE_HAIR_AN_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537629 @@@IR@@@ and @GENE_IRS1 @GENE_25467;29376 @@@IRS1/2@@@.

results.text_hl: Treatment with @CHEMICAL_Cyproterone_acetate_ethinyl_estradiol_drug_combination @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032640 @@@cyproterone acetate/ethinyloestradiol@@@ with addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduced the level of @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_4790 @@@NF-kappaB@@@, @GENE_TGFB1 @GENE_7040 @@@TGF-beta1@@@ and HOMA-@<m>DISEASE_HAIR_AN_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537629 @@@IR@@@ and increased the level of @GENE_THBS1 @GENE_7057 @@@TSP-1@@@.

results.title: [Molecular mechanisms of insulin resistance and interventional effects of Chinese herbal medicine].
results.text_hl: At present, @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitizers treating @<m>DISEASE_HAIR_AN_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537629 @@@IR@@@ not only have the classic @CHEMICAL_Thiazolidinediones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D045162 @@@thiazolidinediones@@@ and its ramifications but also have the newly discovered @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@vitamin D.@@@ In addition, it is reported that some extracts from single Chinese herbal medicine(CHM)and Chinese herbal compound prescription such as total @CHEMICAL_flavone @CHEMICAL_MESH:C043562 @@@flavone@@@ from the flowers of Abelmoschl manihot, @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@berberine@@@, astragalus polysaccharides and Huang-qi decoction also have the beneficial effects in ameliorating @<m>DISEASE_HAIR_AN_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537629 @@@IR@@@.

citations.NLM: Yee HY, Yang JJ, Wan YG, Chong FL, Wu W, Long Y, Han WB, Liu YL, Tu Y, Yao J. [Molecular mechanisms of insulin resistance and interventional effects of Chinese herbal medicine]. Zhongguo Zhong Yao Za Zhi. 2019 Apr;44(7):1289-1294. PMID: 31090283

results.title: Utilization of antidiabetic drugs in Hong Kong: relation to the common occurrence of antidiabetic drug-induced hypoglycemia amongst acute medical admissions and the relative prevalence of NIDDM.
results.text_hl: The GOPD and the @<m>DISEASE_HAIR_AN_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537629 @@@HA@@@ each accounted for approximately half of the @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulphonylureas@@@ (55% vs 45%) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (43% vs 57%) prescribed.
